Feline Civic Design, Since 1989

We believe every parking lot is a cathedral of practical sunlight.

Purrimeter Holdings serves institutions, clinics, shopping corridors, and municipal wards with a single conviction: the painted bay is society's most humane room. Wide lanes calm the nerves. Honest asphalt gives each citizen a place to arrive, stretch, and return to the day with whiskers lifted.

Questions We Receive At Dusk

Do you only work on new builds?

Not at all. Most of our practice is restorative: tired lots, confused arrows, fading ADA zones, and forgotten pedestrian seams.

Can you coordinate with existing architects?

Yes. We collaborate with civil, landscape, and municipal teams while preserving our core line philosophy: clean, legible, gentle.

Why the cat language?

Because cats understand territory without cruelty. Our methods are calm, precise, and attentive to how bodies move in shared space.
